body.name: My Happy Marriage, Vol. 5 (light novel) (My Happy Marriage (novel))
body.description: LOVE AT A CROSSROADS…Though Miyo managed to escape Usui after Kiyoka came to her aid, the Gifted Communion continues to gain power and influence across Japan. Foreseeing that Usui and his organization will make another attempt to capture Miyo, Crown Prince Takaihito proposes that she and Kiyoka shelter with him in the Imperial Palace. But as Miyo adjusts to her new surroundings, she is taken aback by her feelings for Kiyoka, which have only intensified since her rescue. Caught between the fear of changing a relationship that already brings her happiness and the desire to express genuine love for her fiancé, Miyo wavers over finally opening up to Kiyoka… Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars can’t wait for the next 💜
reviews.reviewText: So in this one, the action has continued to pick up. It’s obviously the main focal point of the novel. That’s not to say there are no interactions between Kiyoka and Miyo however. There are and they are very important and a longtime coming I think. I think the development between them and how it it’s happening is cute too. Now the ending was a bit predictable for me. I still enjoyed it but you can kind of see it coming. And SPOILER ALERT: it ends on a cliffhanger which makes me sad. But fortunately the next book is set to release soon 💜

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cliff hanger warning.
reviews.reviewText: This continues to go back and forth. Good, traitors, tyrants.The characters are being very developed and growing and changing.From a simple abandoned and cruelly treated girl to a determined woman. From timid to moving forward. From love to agony.Ahh. Good story telling.Looking forward to finally having a happy wedding. Surely nothing beyond the current villain can happen to stop it?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can’t wait to watch the anime online. I love all the books. I’m soAnxious to see what happen next. In love with the characters. Arata action not surprise. Love loveLove happy marriage..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this whole series is perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I got hooked on the anime that was recently released on Netflix and the first place I knew where to look was on here and I'm beyond great full! I will treasure this forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It will take 25 volumes for Miyo to get married. The story moves SLOWLY
reviews.reviewText: I love this story. So, I was really excited when Vol. 5 was released. But, I was a bit disappointed. The writing is great but the heavy emphasis on military strategy to fight the antagonist Usui was the bulk of the volume.This volume was a bridge to the next phase of Kiyoka and Miyo's relationship. I get that this is a light novel, but Vol 5 and 6 should have been combined into one volume. I don't want to give away the story, but after reading it, I wanted more (maybe that was the author's intent). Now we have to wait until Feb 20, 2024, to find out what happens next. My advice, wait until February 18 to read Volume 5, so you can go straight to Volume 6 to get a fuller story. You won't miss anything by waiting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buff ese final!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Ayy ese final!!!! No puede ser que tengamos que esperar a que salga el volumen 6 para saber que pasará!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So much was wrong with this one it hurt my feelings. It's not going to stop me from reading just yet. I do love this series. However, besides, this volume being too short. Miyo was growing as a character in the other volumes, finding her voice. Then you took it completely away. WHY? Just because a woman is demure as well as the damsel in distress doesn't make her an idiot. In this book, she was way too slow, unsure, confused, and weak. You can't write that she is powerful in her dream site realm if you make her weak in her dream site realm. Why even give her a power if she is not smart enough to use it? I believe in my heart it will get better, but this was upsetting. I was definitely expecting more, not just from Miyo; but all characters in power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the series but not vol 5 so much
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I love the original story and the characters but my main issue is Miyo’s growth. I was just frustrated how the story is going. I mean how many ways can you keep writing the same lessen over and over again: Miyo keeps her feelings shut and learns at the end that she needs to express them.Just seems that the author is purposely keeping her stupid, and Miyo is incapable of growing. Maybe I’m just bothered that she is not turning out to be a strong female character.Will I buy the next volume? Yeah cuz it left me hanging, and Kiyoka!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't wait to see the rest of the story to expand after the mangas and anime! Just gorgeous! Lots of healing, companionship, magic and love in this story.

This book is a waste of money. The story plot was boring and not much actions involved. Miyo sounds like a child.. Hated her character in this volume. Anyway this volume was messy, boring and a waste of time and money. Don't think I'll buy the vol. 6
Eine sehr fesselnde Geschichte, weiter so! Bin gespannt wie es weiter geht. Lohnt sich auf jeden Fall es weiter zu lesen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s not as good as the others and feels like your dragging it out for more books I’m starting to get board and skipping ahead
